articles.description: After being delayed due to COVID-19, construction for a Twin Falls Texas Roadhouse has restarted. Officials say the introduction of more chain restaurants shouldn’t hurt local restaurants.
articles.content: TWIN FALLS, Idaho (KMVT/KSVT) - After being delayed due to COVID-19, construction for a Twin Falls Texas Roadhouse has restarted. KMVT asked what kind of competition could this create for southern Id… [+2702 chars]

articles.title: COVID Updates: Governors Cuomo and Murphy say national cases threaten progress in New York, New Jersey - WABC-TV
articles.description: Governor Andrew Cuomo is warning that New York State's progress against COVID-19 is being threatened by the national surge in cases.
